landingPage.title: DEMÉTER
landingPage.subtitle: Revolutionize agriculture with advanced technology
landingPage.description: Deméter is an advanced system that transforms agriculture through technology and automation. It optimizes food production with data collection devices and automated systems. My goal is to provide high-quality food, promoting sustainable agricultural practices and supporting the agricultural community. Deméter minimizes the use of natural resources, reduces carbon footprint and protects biodiversity, improving efficiency and avoiding pollution. We empower local farmers with access to advanced technologies and accurate data, promoting equity and economic development. With Deméter, the agriculture of the future is green, fair and prosperous.

projectContext.title: Project Context
projectContext.text: This project was presented in 2024 as a prototype at a Nestlé innovation contest hackathon, demonstrating the potential of technology-driven solutions for sustainable agriculture.

projectPhilosophy.title: Project Philosophy
projectPhilosophy.text: The essence of this project goes beyond demonstrating technical complexity. Rather, it represents one of many project ideas and prototype initiatives I have developed over the years. As a natural creative leader, I am ambitious, tenacious, organized, and passionate about acquiring and sharing knowledge. This project serves as a testament to my continuous pursuit of innovation and my commitment to transforming ideas into tangible solutions that can make a meaningful impact.

sensor.title: Sensor Device
sensor.modal: The mobile sensor device is an easy-to-move block that allows collecting precise data on humidity, temperature, nutrients, diseases and pests. This data helps make informed decisions to improve crop health and productivity.

system.title: Administration System
system.modal: The Administration System provides complete data visualization and analysis. It facilitates crop management, inventory, education, zones, personnel, tasks, and more, optimizing farm efficiency.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Improve your farm management with AI that optimizes crops, inventory, education, and more.
ai.modal: Deméter's Artificial Intelligence optimizes farm management by analyzing data from crops, inventory, education, and more. It improves decision-making and operational efficiency. Enables the fastest learning and information search.

demo.title: Try the Deméter System Simulator
demo.description: The prototype is designed to illustrate how the prototype would work on a real farm, providing a clear and practical view of its impact and operation in an authentic agricultural environment.

modal.title: Upcoming Feature
modal.tasks: You will soon be able to manage farm tasks from here. Try the Farm Map or Artificial Intelligence.
modal.inventory: Manage farm inventory easily. Coming soon. Try the Farm Map or Artificial Intelligence.
modal.personnel: Manage your personnel from this section. Available soon. Try the Farm Map or Artificial Intelligence.
modal.training: Agricultural and ecological training will be shown in this section soon. Try the Farm Map or Artificial Intelligence.
modal.ecologicalResources: Here you can access ecological resources for your farm, as well as recipes and tutorials for creating them; such as green agrochemicals. Try the Farm Map or Artificial Intelligence.
modal.others: Other features will be available soon. Try the Farm Map or Artificial Intelligence.

demeterMap.idealIndices: The ideal indices adapt according to the type of plantation.
demeterMap.chargeInstructions: Place the sensor in a sunny place to complete charging.
demeterMap.sensorInstructions: Remember to move the sensor if you want to update zone data.
demeterMap.wateringAlert: The zone is being watered. Place a sensor in this zone if you want to update the indicators.

zone1: Apply phosphorus-rich fertilizer to correct the deficiency.

demeterAI.title: DeméterAI - Agriculture and Ecology Chatbot
demeterAI.subtitle: In the future the chatbot intends to be implemented with ChatGPT, but it was not done initially due to the cost of using the API.
demeterAI.noInfo: Sorry, I don't have information about that. Try selecting another question.

canvasModel.title: Canvas Model: Smart Farm in Costa Rica

valueProposition.title: Value Proposition
valueProposition.environmentalCare: Environmental Care: Implementation of sustainable technologies to reduce the use of water, pesticides and fertilizers, promoting eco-friendly agricultural practices.
valueProposition.farmAutomation: Farm Automation: Use of a mobile device to manage irrigation, pest control and data collection, optimizing agricultural operations.
valueProposition.productionEfficiency: Production Efficiency: Improvement in resource management and reduction of operating costs through the use of sensors and automated systems.
valueProposition.healthImprovement: Health Improvement: Application of agricultural practices that promote healthier food and reduction of harmful chemicals in crops.

customerSegments.title: Customer Segments
customerSegments.sustainableFarmers: Sustainable Farmers: Seek to adopt practices that minimize environmental impact and improve crop quality.
customerSegments.greenAgroindustrial: Green Agroindustrial Companies: Interested in technologies that optimize production and reduce environmental impact.
customerSegments.healthConscious: Health-Conscious Consumers: People who prefer food grown sustainably and free of chemicals.

channels.title: Channels
channels.webApp: Web Application: Platform for monitoring and managing the farm, accessible from any device.
channels.greenDistributors: Green Technology Distributors: Associations and companies that promote sustainable agricultural practices.
channels.projectWebsite: Project Website: Information about the technology, environmental and health benefits, and resources for users.

customerRelationships.title: Customer Relationships
customerRelationships.technicalSupport: Technical Support and Training: Training on the use of the device and application to maximize environmental and health benefits.
customerRelationships.sustainableConsulting: Sustainable Agriculture Consulting: Advice on ecological agricultural practices and techniques.
customerRelationships.alertsNotifications: Alerts and Notifications: Information about crop status and recommendations to improve health and sustainability.

revenueStreams.title: Revenue Streams
revenueStreams.deviceSales: Mobile Device Sales: Revenue from the commercialization of the device that facilitates sustainable agriculture.
revenueStreams.webAppSubscription: Web Application Subscription: Access to advanced tools for efficient and sustainable crop management.
revenueStreams.consultingServices: Consulting and Maintenance Services: Advice on sustainable practices and device maintenance.

keyResources.title: Key Resources
keyResources.sensorTechnology: Environmental Sensor Technology: Sensors that monitor soil health, climate and crop status.
keyResources.demeterDevice: Deméter Mobile Device: Equipped to perform monitoring tasks, automated irrigation and pest control efficiently.
keyResources.developmentTeam: Sustainable Development Team: Engineers and experts in agricultural technology focused on sustainability and health.

keyActivities.title: Key Activities
keyActivities.ecoTechnologyDevelopment: Ecological Technology Development: Research and development of sensors and devices that promote environmentally friendly agricultural practices.
keyActivities.irrigationControlImplementation: Irrigation and Control Solution Implementation: Automation of systems for efficient use of water and pesticides.
keyActivities.educationTraining: Education and Training: Training for users on the use of technology to improve health and sustainability.

keyPartners.title: Key Partners
keyPartners.nestle: Nestlé: Seed capital investment. This project was presented as a prototype at the 2024 Nestlé innovation contest hackathon.
keyPartners.greenSuppliers: Green Technology Suppliers: Companies that supply materials and technologies for sustainable agricultural practices.
keyPartners.environmentalOrganizations: Environmental Organizations: Collaboration to validate practices and promote the adoption of green technologies.
keyPartners.academicInstitutions: Academic Institutions: Joint research and development for innovations in sustainable agriculture.

costStructure.title: Cost Structure
costStructure.technologyDevelopment: Technology Development and Production: Investment in the creation of the mobile device and application for sustainable management.
costStructure.marketingEducation: Marketing and Education: Costs associated with promoting sustainable practices and user training.
costStructure.supportConsulting: Support and Consulting: Expenses related to technical support and consulting services in ecological agriculture.

profile.name: Steven Morales Fallas
profile.roles: Software Developer, Designer, Teacher and Entrepreneur.
profile.description: I stand out for my high creativity and exceptional skills, driven by a deep passion for innovation and continuous improvement of the world. My enthusiasm extends to various areas of STEAM, where I always seek new ways to create and develop. If I had to describe myself in six words, they would be: innovative, adaptable, ambitious, self-taught, efficient and ingenious.
profile.quote: "The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do" Steve Jobs
